import React, { Component } from "react"; import { ProductConsumer } from "../context.js"; import "./Details.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default class Details extends Component { render() { return ( {value => { const { id, company, img, info, price, title, inCart } = value.detailProduct; return (

${price} $29.00

{info}

); }} ); } }
